doc.description: Track poistion of a tag (ArUco, QRcode, ...) detected by an onboard camera The tag detection and pose computation is done outside of the module, only the estimation by fusion of AHRS and visual detection with a Kalman filter is performed in this module

define.name: WP
define.description: if defined, update the position of the waypoint at the location of the tag; if TAG waypoint exists in flight plan, it is used by default

define.name: SIM_WP
define.description: designate a waypoint to be used as virtual tag in simulation; if TARGET waypoint exists in flight plan, it is used by default

define.name: BODY_TO_CAM_PHI
define.description: rotation from body to cam frame (phi)

define.name: BODY_TO_CAM_THETA
define.description: rotation from body to cam frame (theta)

define.name: BODY_TO_CAM_PSI
define.description: rotation from body to cam frame (psi)

define.name: CAM_POS_X
define.description: camera position in meter in body frame (X axis)

define.name: CAM_POS_Y
define.description: camera position in meter in body frame (Y axis)

define.name: CAM_POS_Z
define.description: camera position in meter in body frame (Z axis)

define.name: COORD_TO_M
define.description: transformation from camera coordinates to meters (default: mm to m)

define.name: R
define.description: process noise in kalman filter

define.name: Q_SIGMA2
define.description: measurement noise in kalman filter

define.name: P0_POS
define.description: initial covariance on position

define.name: P0_SPEED
define.description: initial covariance on speed

define.name: TIMEOUT
define.description: timeout for lost tracking in seconds

define.name: PREDICT_TIME
define.description: position prediction time when moving waypoint

define.name: MAX_OFFSET
define.description: maximum position offset for predicted positin compared to estimated position

define.name: MAX_SPEED
define.description: maximum horiontal speed for the tracking control

define.name: MAX_VZ
define.description: maximum vertical speed for the tracking control

define.name: KP
define.description: horizontal gain on position error

define.name: KPZ
define.description: vertical gain on position error
